name: Whoogle
short_description: Privacy-focused metasearch engine - fast, clean Google-like search results.
description: Privacy-focused metasearch engine - fast, clean Google-like search results. Whoogle is a self-hosted application focused on search, privacy, utility, self-hosted. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Whoogle on your home server to privacy-focused metasearch engine - fast, clean google-like search results without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Whoogle to manage your search workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
